titles.title: A bill to amend the Middle Atlantic Interstate Forest Fire Protection Compact to include the State of Ohio.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Byrd for Senator Biden without amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 889.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 4/29/1988--Introduced. Amends the Middle Atlantic Interstate Forest Fire Protection Compact to include Ohio.
